C

clear() - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Removes all preference headers from the adapter.
clearPreferenceHeaders() - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
Removes all preference headers, which are currently added to the activity.
Condition - Class in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util
An utility class, which offers static methods to ensure, that attributes satisfy specific conditions by throwing exceptions, if the conditions are not satisfied.
convertDpToPixels(Context, int) - Static method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util.DisplayUtil
Converts a dp value to a pixel value.
convertPixelsToDp(Context, int) - Static method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.util.DisplayUtil
Converts a pixel value to a dp value.
CREATOR - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceHeader
A creator, which allows to create instances of the class PreferenceHeader from parcels.
CURRENT_BUNDLE_EXTRA - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
The name of the extra, which is used to save the parameters, which have been passed when the currently shown fragment has been created, within a bundle.
CURRENT_PREFERENCE_HEADER_EXTRA - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
The name of the extra, which is used to save the currently selected preference header, within a bundle.
CURRENT_SHORT_TITLE_EXTRA - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
The name of the extra, which is used to save the short title, which is currently used by the bread crumb, within a bundle.
CURRENT_TITLE_EXTRA - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
The name of the extra, which is used to save the title, which is currently used by the bread crumb, within a bundle.
